title: IL2 Sturmovik 46 4.08 UNZIP-PLAY NO INSTALL NEED
description: NO INSTALL NEED. Just unzip with winrar. Place your Ubisoft folder where you want to. Find conf.ini and change to the resolution you have if it is more than the game options are. Then find il2setup.exe and make your setups (opengl = ATI or DirectX = Nvidea) Think that is the best way for your graffik but you will se that when you start the game. Then find il2fb.exe and make a short cut to you destop or where you whant it. Klick that and play. Install Hyperlobby Client: A client for on-line flying (FUN) Then have a nice day and shere with others. THIS IS WORKING 100%.
